name: Christmas Candle ornament
description: The cutest and essential Christmas ornament! The candle is knitted bottom up in the round, easy to work on and suitable for the beginners.
full_text: The cutest and essential Christmas ornament! The candle is knitted bottom up in the round, easy to work on and suitable for the beginners. You can hang a candle on your Christmas tree or make a garland. It´s not required to meet the established gauge, you can use any kind of yarn, but the size of the finished item will change accordingly. The pattern is a great stash buster! Find me on Instagram: @thiscosynest
